glsa.title: libass: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libass, the worst of which have unknown impacts.

background.p: libass is a portable subtitle renderer for the ASS/SSA (Advanced Substation Alpha/Substation Alpha) subtitle format.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libass. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition or other unknown impacts via unknown attack vectors.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libass users should upgrade to the latest version:
